opener.text: Puny mortal, why did you come here?

follow_up.text: Why are you here? Did you want to fight me?

final.text: Fine, how about a peak at what I can offer. It'll only cost you a finger.

what do you want.text: What do you want. I'm busy counting my toe collection.

Offend.text: It is not gorss. Toes are magnificent. Come here you, I'll take yours too for the collection!

Interest.text: I see, another man of culture. However my collection is not complete. I will show you some day if you wish. For now would you like to see my collection of random junk?

final.text: Well, if you change your mind I will be here, counting toes...

opener.text: You dare come here mortal. I guess it's time for a more permanent stay.
